definition: right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)
contrast (balance of black and white in TV screen setup)/degree of contrast
temperature contrast/difference in temperature (of body to its surroundings)

sentences.english: By means of comparative analysis in order, this paper puts special emphasis on clarifying their dual characteristic.
sentences.chinese: 本文將通過逐項對比分析，着重闡明二者的對偶性。

sentences.english: The dynamic response at different positions in the flat end plat and cylindrical shell was comparatively analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 分析對比殼體和封頭不同位置應力響應。

sentences.english: An iodine-based contrast is injected into the bloodstream and watched as it travels around.
sentences.chinese: 注射到血液中碘的對比，看着它旅行左右。

sentences.english: Contrastive Rhetoric (CR) studies the differences of discourse patterns across languages and cultures.
sentences.chinese: 對比修辭研究不同語言及文化間的語篇模式差異。

sentences.english: In contrast with developed islands, this paper also analyzed the problems exposed in earlier exploitation.
sentences.chinese: 對比已開發無人島現狀，分析開發中凸顯的問題。

sentences.english: Also, it would be best to stick with darker stripes, because contrasting colors add more depth.
sentences.chinese: 暗條紋也是個絕佳之選，因爲對比色會增加視覺深度。

sentences.english: The aim of this thesis is to compare and study the differences of phatic language between English and Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 本論文旨在對比研究應酬語在英漢語中的區別。

sentences.english: What about motorcycle V. S. car oils ???
sentences.chinese: 摩托車和汽車機油對比怎麼樣？

sentences.english: They should combine the comprehensive land using situation to develop the two types of residences, tog…
sentences.chinese: 這兩種類型各具優劣，下面我們將二者進行對比分析。

sentences.english: Conclusion Using iso-osmolar contrast media may prevent from contrast-induced nephropathy.
sentences.chinese: 結論應用等滲對比劑可降低對比劑腎病的發生率。

sentences.english: Conclusion Using iso-osmolar contrast media may prevent from contrast-induced nephropathy.
sentences.chinese: 結論應用等滲對比劑可降低對比劑腎病的發生率。

sentences.english: They have cooked and compared North and South Korean dishes.
sentences.chinese: 一起做菜，對比朝鮮和韓國菜。

sentences.english: The results of the isotropic model are better than that of modified Cam-clay.
sentences.chinese: 對比計算結果說明各向同性模型優於修正劍橋模型。

sentences.english: Contrastive study of syntax structure of yes-no questions in Russian and Chinese is made in part two.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分主要是俄漢語是非問句的句法結構對比研究。

sentences.english: Experiment of culturing Tricholoma giganteum by using rapeseed coat as culture material was carried out.
sentences.chinese: 用菜籽皮作培養料進行了巨大口蘑的栽培對比試驗。

sentences.english: It's a contrast that grows more stark when seen through the eyes of history.
sentences.chinese: 這種對比在歷史的視角下更爲了然。

definition: to contrast/to compare/to place side by side for comparison (as parallel texts)/to check
whole entity/entire body/synthesis/as a whole (situation, construction, team etc)/global/macrocosm/integral/holistic/whole
to compare/to dispute/compared to/(before adj.) relatively/comparatively/rather/also pr. [jiao3]
to appear/to emerge/to present (a certain appearance)/to demonstrate
